src:
Finac deli pravdu Partizanu na Old Trafordu
04 Nov 2019, 12:04 by Darko
UEFA je za glavnog sudiju utakmice 4. kola Lige Evrope između Mančester Junajteda i Partizana odredila Finca Matijasa Gestraniusa.
Finski arbitar je internacionalac od 2009. godine, ali nije imao mnogo susreta sa srpskim klubovima i reprezentacijama.
Pre dve godine sudio je meč prvog kola kvalifikacija za Ligu Evrope između Crvene zvezde i Florijane (2:0), dok Partizanu, ali ni Mančester Junajtedu do sada nije sudio.
Gestraniusu će pomagati Jan-Peter Aravirta i Miko Alakare, a za četvrtog sudiju je određen Vile Nevalainen.
Utakmica između Mančester Junajteda i Partizana se igra u četvrtak, na Old Trafordu, od 21 čas.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Finn shares justice for Partizan at Old Traford
04 Nov 2019, 11:04 by Darko
UEFA has appointed Finn Matthias Gestranius to be the referee of the Europa League match between Manchester United and Partizan.
The Finnish arbiter has been international since 2009 but has not had many meetings with Serbian clubs and national teams.
Two years ago he judged the match of the first round of qualifying for the Europa League between Red Star and Floriana (2: 0), while Partizan, but neither Manchester United has so far been judged.
Gestranius will be assisted by Jan-Peter Aravirta and Miko Alakare, with Vile Nevalainen appointed as the fourth referee.
The match between Manchester United and Partizan is played on Thursday at Old Traford from 9pm.
